targets.query: select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.status/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.cinder.http.*.5\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.cinder.http.GET.*/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.cinder.http.POST.*/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.cinder.http.PUT.*/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.cinder.http.DELETE.*/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.keystone.check_api/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.cinder.http.*.1\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.cinder.http.*.2\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.cinder.http.*.3\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.cinder.http.*.4\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.cinder.http.*.5\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.volume_creation_time/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/haproxy.backend.cinder-api.servers.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/haproxy.backend.cinder-api.servers.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.services.scheduler.disabled/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.services.volume.disabled/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.services.backup.disabled/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.services.scheduler.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.services.volume.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.services.backup.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.services.scheduler.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.services.volume.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.services.backup.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.volumes.available/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.volumes.in-use/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.volumes.error/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.snapshots.available/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.snapshots.in-use/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.snapshots.error/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.volumes_size.available/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.volumes_size.in-use/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.volumes_size.error/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.snapshots_size.available/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.snapshot_size.in-use/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.snapshots_size.error/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
